tool_description: Calculates theoretical and practical capacity values for road segments based on geometric design, traffic composition, and operating conditions.

road_segments.description: Array of road segment identifiers for capacity calculation

lane_widths.description: Lane widths in meters for each segment

number_of_lanes.description: Number of lanes for each road segment

speed_limits.description: Speed limits in km/h for each segment

error_messages: Invalid road segments: road_segments array cannot be empty
Array length mismatch: lane_widths, number_of_lanes, and speed_limits must have same length as road_segments
Invalid lane width: Lane widths must be between 2.5 and 5.0 meters
Invalid lane count: Number of lanes must be between 1 and 8
Invalid speed limit: Speed limits must be between 20 and 120 km/h
usage: Provide road_segments array with corresponding lane_widths, number_of_lanes, and speed_limits arrays. All arrays must have the same length.

theoretical_capacity.description: Theoretical capacity in vehicles per hour for each segment

capacity_per_lane.description: Capacity per lane for each road segment

level_of_service_thresholds.description: Volume thresholds for different levels of service
